overview:
Jan Webering was appointed COO of YOC AG in July 2008. He is responsible for the internationalisation of the YOC Group, the operational business and product development and also for the business unit Mobile Internet.

In his last position as CEO of Sevenval AG, he was responsible for sales, marketing and professional services. Before founding Sevenval, Webering had been head of several companies, e.g. the internet consultancy net-consulting. Prior to this, Jan Webering studied law at the University of Cologne. Following the acquisition of Sevenval by YOC AG in September 2007, Jan Webering has successfully continued to lead the company.
